message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet at $115?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $108?
I'm glad you're willing to compromise, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet at $112?
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. How about we meet at $109?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet at $110?
I'm really close, but I'm not willing to go above $108. That's my final offer.
